entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
